title: Botanicals Design
description: This website was originally in WordPress, and I instead switch the tech stack to use React, specifically Gatsby for Static Site Generation. It is a very image-heavy site, so I utilized many responsive image techniques.

title: Avarice Sheets
description: This is an enourmous application I have been working on for quite a while. It is built using React and Redux, along with Redux-Saga. I design and built the UI from scratch, with Scss. The backend is a Node/Express REST API and a MongoDB database (see the project below). NOTE: You will have to register an account to view it. If you do not wish to do so, please type 'test@test.com' as email, and 'password' as password to use a test account.

title: Avarice Sheets API
description: A Node/Express backend REST API for Avarice Sheets. It is built following MVC prinicples, and utilizes a MongoDB database in the cloud (Atlas).
